item.title: Version 0.15.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.15.0

What’s New

  • Air Traffic Control: Create rules to automatically route links to specific spaces based on URL patterns. Filter by source browser and choose whether rules apply when saving or opening links.
  • Profile & Browser-Linked Spaces: Link any space to a browser profile or a specific browser. Switching spaces instantly raises the correct window using Accessibility APIs. Includes profile discovery across Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Arc.
  • Smart Attach: Sidebar now truly integrates with your browser. It auto-shows when your browser is in focus, brings the browser forward when activated, and hides when you switch to other apps. Choose between Independent and Smart Attach modes.
  • Auto-Tiling: Browser windows automatically arrange alongside the sidebar. Smart mode tiles only the active profile’s windows, while All mode tiles every browser window.
  • Shared Spaces: Publish any space as a shareable link collection. Others can view and import your shared spaces into their own sidebar.
  • Import & Export: Back up and transfer your data with the new .ssb file format. Export everything or import from another device.
  • Spotlight-Like Search: Completely redesigned search with token matching, inline autocomplete, and selection memory. Finds links by title, URL, notes, and tags.
  • Expanded Pin Icons: Customize pinned link icons with emoji, SF Symbols, or upload your own image.
  • Drag-to-Reorder Pinned Tabs: Rearrange your pinned links directly by dragging them into the order you want.
  • Copy All URLs: Bulk copy or open all URLs from any folder, smart folder, or live tabs. Also works with multi-selected links.
  • Paste from Clipboard: Right-click any folder or space to paste a URL directly from your clipboard.
  • Tab Restore on Space Switch: When switching between profile spaces, a prompt shows any tabs that were open before with options to restore or skip. Configurable per-space with a “Don’t ask again” option.
  • Fill Screen Shortcut: Press Cmd+Opt+F to toggle fill screen mode, instantly positioning the sidebar and browser to use your full display.
  • Adaptive Spaces Bar: Arc-style bottom bar that dynamically sizes space icons based on available width - icons shrink progressively as you add more spaces, with dock-style hover magnification.
  • More AI Models: Added Ollama as an AI tagging provider alongside the expanded MLX model list for on-device tag suggestions.
  • Space Switch Suggestion: When you activate a browser or profile linked to a different space, the sidebar suggests switching to the matching space automatically.
  • Free Tier Update: The free plan now includes 3 spaces instead of 1, giving new users more room to organize before upgrading.

Improvements

  • Don’t Reload Open Tabs: Clicking a saved or pinned link that’s already open now switches to it without reloading the page.
  • Edit from Context Menu: Pinned links context menu now includes Edit and Open Preview options.
  • Preferred Browser: “Browser Saved From” renamed to “Preferred Browser” for clarity across the app and menu bar.
  • Auto-Raise Browser: Opening the sidebar now automatically brings the browser window to the front, so it’s always ready alongside your tabs. With Smart Attach enabled, the sidebar and browser automatically tile side-by-side or fill the screen together.
  • Floating Tooltips: Space icons now show floating tooltips on hover for better identification.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed folder count not updating correctly after pinning a link.
  • Fixed multi-select drag not moving all selected links together.
  • Fixed subfolder spacing gap and header height shifting on hover.
  • Fixed crash when scrolling through folders with 80+ tabs.
  • Fixed live tabs causing lag with 30+ open tabs.
  • Fixed sidebar not staying within screen bounds in attach mode.

Performance

  • Optimized folder tree rendering for large collections (80+ tabs per folder).
  • Adaptive live tabs polling - faster when active, slower when sidebar is hidden.
